<font size="10">
Reference management
</font>


## Staying organized

### Reference management software has 2 benefits:

1. keeps your references organized and easily searchable

2. (generally) integrated with word processing software to create citations and literature cited section


## Software options

| Software | Pros | Cons |
|:--:|:---|:---|
| [EndNote](https://endnote.com/downloads) | works with MS Word | not free |
| [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/download/) | works with MS Word; browser plug-in | can be hard to share |
| [Mendeley](https://www.mendeley.com/download-reference-manager/) | works with MS Word | can be hard to share |
| [BibTeX](http://www.bibtex.org/) | works with LaTeX & Markdown | antiquated |
